English: Do you want to delete all you data?
Others: Do you want to delete all you data?
Japanese: すべてのデータを消去しますか?

English: Do you want to donate all your money to a ghost sanctuary?
Others: Do you want to donate all your money to a ghost sanctuary?
Japanese: 幽霊保護区にお金を寄付しますか？

English: Do you want to erase all your memories back to when you got back here? You will forget number of ghost captured, Luna Fucked and ghost fucked.
Others: Do you want to erase all your memories back to when you got back here? You will forget number of ghost captured, Tsukiko fucked and ghost fucked.

Others: Throw Away all your travel Passes? You will need to buy them again to visit different sites.
Japanese: 旅行券を捨てますか？ マップをプレイしたい場合は、再度購入する必要があります。

Others: Do you want to free all ghosts the captivity?

Japanese: VideoTube アカウントを削除して、新しいアカウントを作成しますか?

Japanese: 集めた服を全部捨てませんか？
